title: Angler
summaries: The Angler is an NPC concerned exclusively with fishing, who appears as a young boy. He does not sell anything, but rather assigns quests to players. Quest objectives generally involve catching him rare fish from particular biomes or layers, for which he dispenses various rewards.

On <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile</linked>, he will throw <linked>Frost Daggerfish</linked> at nearby enemies when threatened, dealing 10 / <linked>15</linked> / <linked>17</linked> damage at the start of the game.
• Additionally, on [img:Desktop version] Desktop, [img:Console version] Console, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile he will gain various stat increases as the player progresses.
The Angler is first encountered as the Sleeping Angler randomly spawning on the sand or on the water surface of the Ocean biome (or rarely in the underworld). He will move in when:

• There is an empty house.
  • The player has interacted with him and has woken him up (âš· Open / Activate).
The Sleeping Angler is one of the few entities that can be detected by the Lifeform Analyzer(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) or its upgrades.
